question: You have learned that a financial organisation in your city gives money as a loan to students who like to take a part-time course. You are interested to do the course and have decided to take a loan.Write a letter to a local financial organisation. In your letter,•	give your qualifications and work experience•	give details about the course•	explain how this course will help you
text: I am writing this letter to receive more detailed information regarding a loan for students or employees who would like to be enrolled in a course which has been recently announced by your bank on a local business radio show.

Last year I graduated from Durham University in London where I obtained a bachelor degree in Physics. Since my graduation I have been working as a Physical education teacher in ABC boarding school. I have gained valuable insights in teaching disabled adolescents and now I also am interested in studying child psychology.

Every year in spring Durham University conducts a course which is based on the subject of psychology concerning children. They offer a comprehensive six-month-long curriculum intended to obtain basic knowledge in this field along with one-month practice in a children hospital.

Being a teacher in the center where I work requires me to have some basic understanding of children’s mindset; therefore I am confident that studying in Durham will provide me with essential information which I could apply during my work duties.
I look forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Since my graduation. Consider adding a comma.
The spelling of center is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
